item.title: Faaast Penguin for Xbox Series launches December 11
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/faaast-penguin-for-xbox-series-launches-december-11

Currently available for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC.

The Xbox Series version of free-to-play multiplayer racing game Faaast Penguin will launch on December 11, developer historia announced.

Faaast Penguin first launched for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on September 20, followed by Switch on on October 3. The game is currently in its second season.

Get the latest details below.

About the Game

Faaast Penguin is an exhilarating and chaotic survival action race where countless rival penguins clash! Set in various global resort locations, players race through high-speed water slides, desert pyramids, jungle waterfalls, and even above the clouds! Use attacks, Ultimate Rides, and shortcuts to reach the finish line faster than anyone else!

Limited-Time Event: “High-Speed Merry Christmaaas!” Kicks Off!

From December 4 to 25, the limited-time event “High-Speed Merry Christmaaas!” will be live after maintenance concludes!

Christmas-themed items like “Santa” and “Red-Nosed Reindeer” make their debut.

Complete limited-time challenges and shop for festive costumes to celebrate the holiday season!

Limited-Time Item Code Distribution!

The consumable item “Christmas Lights” from the limited-time event “High-Speed Merry Christmaaas!” will be available via item codes once maintenance is complete! We’re also distributing the “Round and round floats” as a reward for reaching 500,000 pre-registrations! Be sure to enter the codes during the event periods and try them out in the game!

  • Christmas Lights
    • Item Code: EVX4 FFFF PPPP LCMD
    • Redemption Deadline: December 25, 2024 at 10:00 p.m. PST
  • Round and round floats
    • Item Code: CAXX FFFF PPPP RNBN
    • Redemption Deadline: December 31, 2024 at 9:00 p.m. PST

How to Redeem:

  1. Open the menu and select “Settings & Support.”
  2. Under the “Game” section, select “Redeem” within “Item Code” under “Support.”
  3. Enter the item code.

item.title: DoDonPachi True Death coming to Switch on December 19 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/dodonpachi-true-death-coming-to-switch-on-december-19-in-japan

  • Switch

CAVE Interactive-developed bullet hell shoot 'em up published by Live Wire.

Live Wire will release a Switch version of CAVE Interactive-developed bullet hell shoot ’em up DoDonPachi True Death via Nintendo eShop on December 19 in Japan for 4,400 yen, the company announced. It will only support Japanese as a language option.

DoDonPachi True Death, or DoDonPachi SaiDaiOuJou, first launched for arcades on April 20, 2012 in Japan, followed by Xbox 360 on May 30, 2013. The arcade version was localized and released by exA-Arcadia in November 2020 worldwide.

Watch the Switch announcement trailer below.

Switch Announce Trailer
